message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that will enhance your experience significantly. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is valid for the next 24 hours.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the features of the product, $9,500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I am willing to adjust the price to $9,000. This still reflects the value and quality of the product, while being more accommodating to your current financial situation. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While $9,000 is closer, I'm still hoping to get it for $8,250.  It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a final price of $8,750 for the product. This still maintains a reasonable profit margin for us while being responsive to your budgetary considerations. I believe this price reflects the value and quality of the product, and I hope it will allow us to reach an agreement.

Alice, I truly appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm ready to close the deal, but $8,750 is still a little higher than I can go right now. How about we split the difference and go with $8,500? That would be a fair price for both of us.
